body_html: is this for mul(S, S) -> S? I can't find corresponding APIs at cuSPARSE, any other libraries I should take a look? Also, not sure if the csr matrix mul implementation at scipy is going to fit well in our case

body: is this for `mul(S, S) -> S`? I can't find corresponding APIs at cuSPARSE, any other libraries I should take a look? Also, not sure if the csr matrix mul implementation at [scipy](https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy-0.18.1/reference/generated/scipy.sparse.csr_matrix.multiply.html#scipy.sparse.csr_matrix.multiply) is going to fit well in our case
